Posts.Content: jah wrote: I'm 32 with no family  history of breast cancer.  Last month I had a sore spot in one breast, it was a lump.  I assumed that maybe it had something to do with my period, which was just days away.  After my period, the lump shrunk, but was still there.  This month, the same thing occurred.  Is this likely just a cyst?  I'm going to schedule a visit to the doctor but can't get in for awhile since I'm a new patient.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: changing lump w/ period? jah nayia37
